DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate efficacy Adductor-Canal-Blockade versus femoral nerve block versus placebo muscle strength healthy volunteer . The investigator hypothesize Adductor-Canal-Blockade result less reduction quadriceps muscle strength compare femoral nerve block .
DOC.brief_title: Adductor-Canal-Blockade Versus Femoral Nerve Block Effect Muscle Strength Mobilization Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: write informed consent ASA 1 BMI > 18 og < 25 Can cooperate exam Do speak understand Danish Drug allergy Alcohol drug abuse Daily consumption analgetics prescription Any drug intake within last 48 hour Neuromuscular defect femoral nere , obturator nerve muscle thigh . Previous surgery trauma lower limb Diabetes Mellitus Intake steroid , except steroid inhalation Physical exercise within last 24 hour prior Day 1 2 study
